about_the_game:
Treat yourself to a Parisian holiday! You are invited by Uncle Cassius to pursue your architectural passion. Now, in France! Here you will meet not only the family but other experts who live in the capital of romance and preserve its history and beauty. This city is a place that can satisfy even the most fastidious of people. Have a meal at a café established a century before the existence of the United States, stroll through the lush gardens and fashion streets with the world's most famous brands, and choose a production you'd like to catch at the Moulin Rouge. All this and so much more without even leaving the comfort of your home!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 Immersive Parisian Experience!
Dive into the heart of Paris, the world's most romantic city, as you explore iconic locations such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame, and the Louvre. Each location is meticulously crafted to capture the essence of Paris, from the bustling streets to the serene gardens!

🔎 Engaging Puzzles and Mini-Games!
Put your skills to the test with a wide variety of puzzles that range from architectural challenges to brain-teasing riddles. Each puzzle is designed to enhance your journey through Paris, offering the right balance of difficulty to keep you engaged without breaking the relaxing flow of the game!

🔎 Curiosities and Collectibles!
Embark on a treasure hunt as you uncover hidden curiosities and collectibles scattered throughout the city. These items provide insights into Paris's rich history and culture. Collect rare artifacts, vintage postcards, and secret letters that reveal the city's past, while also unlocking additional content that deepens your experience!

🔎 Stunning Visuals!
Enjoy the beauty of Paris with stunning visuals that bring every scene to life. From the twinkling lights of the Champs-Élysées to the vibrant colors of Montmartre, each location is rendered with breathtaking detail. The game's art style blends realism with a touch of romance, capturing the allure of the city while creating a visual feast for the eyes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Let the magic of Paris, the city of romance and history, sweep you off your feet as you embark on an architectural journey like no other!
